item.title: Report X-2023090643
item.description:
Report X-2023090643

Identified by scraper @ 2023-10-11T15:10:53+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-09-12
  • City: OLIVE BRANCH
  • State: MS
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package was brought to QA already damaged. It appears that improper handling by either PHs during transport or the package itself was improperly handled at the shipper station. DescribePack: Tops of bottles were flipped over and caused liquid to pour out of the pacakge. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Improper handling of the package.
